original_text: “I have said these things to you in figures of speech. The hour is coming when I will no longer speak to you in figures of speech but will tell you plainly about the Father.
korean_text: 이것을 비유로 너희에게 일렀거니와 때가 이르면 다시는 비유로 너희에게 이르지 않고 아버지에 대한 것을 밝히 이르리라

sentences.original_text: I have said these things to you in figures of speech.
when I will no longer speak to you in figures of speech
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 너희에게 비유로 말하지 않을 때

sentences.original_text: but will tell you plainly about the Father.
